mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID AS MEMID, MEM_PW AS MEMPW, MEM_NAME AS MEMNAME, MEM_TEL AS MEMTEL FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, CATE_CODE1, CATE_CODE2) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memCate1}, #{memCate2})
